item.title: Greystar closes in on student housing site
item.author: THE SUNDAY TIMES
item.description:
Greystar, an American investment fund, is in talks to buy Ireland's largest off-campus student housing complex, write Brian Carey and Linda Daly.
The Sunday Times understands that discussions to purchase Point Campus, a 966-bed complex behind the 3Arena in Dublin, are at a very early stage.
The sc...
